item.title: Need a host!
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:8, topic:334314”][quote author=INFEXISOWNS link=topic=430718.msg3162750#msg3162750 date=1269726095]
You Obviously cant be a very good coder, when you cant evern write a post in full english. Slack on writing dude. this will not atract anyone.
[/quote]While I’m not a big fan of complete “WELL YOU INSULTED ME SO I MUST RETALIATE” threads, I’d just like to point something out.

In English:

  • There’s supposed to be one space between words, not 3
  • Only the first word of a sentence is supposed to be capitalized, unless it’s a proper noun
    • “This”, the first word of the sentence, should have been capitalized
  • “Can’t” has an apostrophe between the n and t
  • “Even” isn’t spelled “evern”
  • English is a proper noun – thus, it needs capitalization
  • “Attract” is not spelled “atract”

When you’re trying to tell someone off, at least follow the own rules you’re trying to enforce. Kthx[/quote]

lol this was a good one, its like a 10 year old telling another 10 year old about bad grammer

Read full topic

item.title: Need a host!
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“INFEXISOWNS, post:7, topic:334314”]You Obviously cant be a very good coder, when you cant evern write a post in full english. Slack on writing dude. this will not atract anyone.[/quote]While I’m not a big fan of complete “WELL YOU INSULTED ME SO I MUST RETALIATE” threads, I’d just like to point something out.

In English:

  • There’s supposed to be one space between words, not 3
  • Only the first word of a sentence is supposed to be capitalized, unless it’s a proper noun
    • “This”, the first word of the sentence, should have been capitalized
  • “Can’t” has an apostrophe between the n and t
  • “Even” isn’t spelled “evern”
  • English is a proper noun – thus, it needs capitalization
  • “Attract” is not spelled “atract”

When you’re trying to tell someone off, at least follow the own rules you’re trying to enforce. Kthx

Read full topic

item.title: Need a host!
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

[quote=“mangalover51, post:2, topic:334344”][quote author=WestSideMass link=topic=430718.msg3162545#msg3162545 date=1269709998]
Dude stop spamming this section with your 30 topics asking for help. L2code or gtfo, no one likes leachers.
[/quote] lol all you people are on do, is say leechers… how am i leeching then tell me and give proof dumb ass…[/quote]
I don’t go on MoparScape much and now you see why. You have no common knowledge of Java, you don’t have common knowledge on life, so just stop trying, and leave. Every problem you have with your server, (basically everything you need changed) you post for help, expecting people to spoonfeed you. Learn to code for yourself, because your getting pretty damn annoying.

Read full topic
